title: Hydration is Key
content: Ensure your pet has access to fresh, clean water at all times. Change the water at least twice daily, especially during hot weather.

title: Monsoon Paw Care
content: During monsoon season, dry your pet's paws thoroughly after walks to prevent fungal infections. Use a clean towel and check between toes.

title: Summer Heat Protection
content: Avoid walking your dog during peak afternoon hours (12 PM - 4 PM). Hot pavements can burn paw pads. Walk early morning or late evening.

title: Tick Prevention in India
content: Use vet-approved tick prevention treatments regularly. Check your pet daily for ticks, especially after outdoor activities. Common in Indian climate.

title: Balanced Diet for Indian Breeds
content: Indian breeds like Indian Pariah dogs thrive on a mix of rice, dal, vegetables, and meat. Avoid excessive commercial treats.

title: Cat Grooming Basics
content: Brush your cat regularly to reduce hairballs and matting. Long-haired breeds need daily brushing, short-haired cats weekly.

title: Bird Cage Placement
content: Place bird cages away from direct sunlight, drafts, and kitchen fumes. Ensure good ventilation and natural light.

title: Fish Tank Temperature
content: Maintain consistent water temperature for tropical fish (24-27Â°C). Use a reliable heater and thermometer.

title: Winter Care for Pets
content: Provide warm bedding and shelter during winter months. Short-haired breeds may need sweaters for outdoor activities.

title: Dental Health
content: Brush your pet's teeth 2-3 times weekly with pet-safe toothpaste. Dental treats can help but don't replace brushing.
